thread.title: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus set for a March/April launch date
thread.title_full: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus set for a March/April launch date

title: Huawei P10 and P10 Plus set for a March/April launch date
text:
Huawei P10 and P10 Plus set for a March/April launch date Huawei P10 and P10 Plus set for a March/April launch date By January 9, 2017 “Both the P10 and P10 Plus are rumoured to be powered by Kirin 960 Processor” 
Recently, two Huawei smartphones were spotted online , one with a curved display and the other with a flat panel. Dubbed the P10 and the P10 Plus, the alleged successors of the Huawei P9 ( review ) now have a release date as well. The leak comes directly from Huawei, whose Chairman and CEO of the consumer division Yu Chengdong confirmed that both the smartphones will be announced in the month of March or April. The post also reveals the Plus variant will come with a curved display while the standard variant to ship with a flat screen. As for rest of the specs of the smartphones, rumours claim that the devices will be powered by a Kirin 960 SoC with up to 256GB of storage. Both the smartphones are rumoured to come with 5.5-inch 2K displays and 6GB of RAM as well. For more coverage on Huawei’s upcoming smartphones, stay tuned to our blog.
